Label.text: Newport is built on Appcelerator's Titanium Mobile and utilizes the Alloy framework.

Newport share its base on ChariTi project : Primary design and development by Matthew Congrove with the assistance of Josh Jensen, Roger White, Aaron Hartwig and Fokke Zandbergen. Uses open source code or designs developed by Mads Møller, Fokke Zandbergen, Jon Alter, Tim Wood, Ivo Ivanov and Sérgio Jardim.
